title: Add uploaded images as static assets and apply as Doctors profile card backgrounds

requirements.summary: Add the two provided uploaded images to frontend public static assets with original filenames for stable UI referencing.
acceptanceCriteria: Both files are present in the frontend public static assets directory and are served by the app build without renaming.
The files can be referenced via a stable URL path in React (no backend involvement).

file_operations.description: Add the uploaded JPG file as a public static asset, preserving the original filename so it can be referenced by the UI at a stable path.
Add the uploaded WebP file as a public static asset, preserving the original filename so it can be referenced by the UI at a stable path.

requirements.summary: Apply one uploaded image as a responsive, readable profile background banner on each Doctors page doctor card.
acceptanceCriteria: The Doctors page renders with the chosen uploaded image visible as a background element for each doctor profile card (or an equivalent clearly doctor-profile-related UI region).
Text over the background remains readable (e.g., via overlay, blur, tint, or layout separation) on mobile and desktop.
No user-facing text is added in a language other than English.

file_operations.description: Update the doctor profile cards to include a background/banner region using one of the uploaded static assets (reference via a stable public path such as /assets/Screenshot_2026-02-04-17-14-58-73_1c337646f29875672b5a61192b9010f9-1.jpg or /assets/unnamed.webp). Ensure responsiveness (e.g., fixed/aspect banner area, background-size cover) and preserve text readability via an overlay/tint/blur layer or layout separation, without modifying any files under frontend/src/components/ui.
